OK Select a game Current Entry Fee invited you to play has been created by You Nexa_Light.otf nk57_monospace_no_bd.ttf Cancel Duelit Users Invite Friends Results You Win pts Coins Min. %1$d players Duelits You can earn up to Prizes We will reward the top %1$d Public Tournament Subscribed There aren\'t tournaments for this game at the moment Come back later or start a tournament with your friends Players Select Game All Games How to play? Gestures: Swipe the ball with your finger and continue controlling it until you hit the target. Every goal counts but you will receive more points if you hit the target. Time left: You have one minute to complete the challenge ! Rank: You will be able to see in real time who are the players that are doing better. Your rank: You will always see how you rank with respect to others. Close Move a fruit: Mix and match fruits in a combination of 3 or more to earn points. The faster you make matches, the higher your score. Win: Clear the playing field by forming groups of three or more like-colored ice cream balls to earn points. Shoot ice cream scoops: The game ends when the ice cream balls reach the bottom line of the screen or you get to the 1 minute time limit. The more ice cream balls destroyed in one shot, the more points scored. Move pieces from side to side or rotate them to complete a row and earn points. Complete a row Left - Right Tap the arrows to move the pieces left and right. Tap the down arrow to drop the piece and tap the circled arrows to rotate the piece. Drop - Rotate Skip Play & Win Turn your skills into money by taking advantage of mobile moments. Challenge your friends or access tournaments and earn money while having fun. Add and Challenge your friends Add friends from Facebook or exisiting Duelit users and start challenging them! Buy coins Buy coins easily through in app purchases. Start earning money while honing your skills and having fun SIGN_UP LOGIN Access all available games, popular and recently played ones. Access all the tournaments youâ€™ve been invited to. Accept invitations, open the game or simply check your history. Access your friend list and other duelit users and add them as your friends. Invite your own friends to be part of the Duelit experience. Check transaction activity and available coins. Access tournaments you can play right away! Access and edit your personal and cash out information. Buy coins to start enjoying challenges and tournaments . Answer each of the questions correctly to earn points. Throw the ball and score With every question, you will get an instant notice if your answer was right or wrong. Correct - Wrong Throw the balls and try to land them in the red cups to earn points. Each row gives you different scores. The further the cup, the more points you make. By bouncing the ball you can double the points. Before throwing, you can manage the strength and direction of the ball by seeing the blue bar. Strength - Direction There aren\'t leaders for this game Duelit Tournament Ends At 1st Popular Your first name or last name have invalid characters, please correct them. Answer the question Do you really want to logout? You don\'t have Duelit friends to challenge. Let\'s add some! Retry Go back Make sure your device is connected to the Internet Hey!
